title: Targeted treatment shrinks deadly pediatric brain tumors

title_detail.value: Targeted treatment shrinks deadly pediatric brain tumors

summary: For children -- whose tiny bodies are still growing -- chemotherapy and radiation treatments can cause lifelong damage. Now, scientists have reported that a targeted therapy that blocks a protein called LSD1 was able to shrink tumors in mice with a form of pediatric brain cancer known as medulloblastoma. LSD1 inhibitors are currently under evaluation in clinical trials for other cancers.
